config.sql: select c.sname as text,c.scode as id,c.cisleaf as leaf,n.dd_risk,n.l_risk,n.m_risk,n.h_risk from dw_dimcompany c left join(select scompany, sum(decode(nrange,'0', counts,0)) dd_risk, sum(decode(nrange,'1', counts,0)) l_risk, sum(decode(nrange,'2', counts,0)) m_risk, sum(decode(nrange,'3', counts,0)) h_risk from ( select scompany,nrange , count(nrange) as counts from Sys_RiskRange where scompany = :company and speriod in = :period group by scompany ,nrange) nwt group by scompany ) n on c.scode = n.scompany where c.scode :company

select c.sname as text,c.scode as id,c.cisleaf as leaf,n.ddt_risk,n.yy_risk,n.sc_risk,n.fl_risk ,n.zl_risk,n.cw_risk from dw_dimcompany c left join(select scompany, sum(decode(ntype,'0', counts,0)) ddt_risk, sum(decode(ntype,'1', counts,0)) yy_risk, sum(decode(ntype,'2', counts,0)) sc_risk, sum(decode(ntype,'3', counts,0)) fl_risk, sum(decode(ntype,'4', counts,0)) zl_risk, sum(decode(ntype,'5', counts,0)) cw_risk from( select scompany,ntype , count(nrange) as counts from Sys_RiskRange where scompany in(SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY where SCODE in ( select scomcode from SYS_USERCOMPANY where SUSER = 'xuzhao') and spcode = '0' and cisdel = 'N') and speriod in( '201603') group by scompany ,ntype) nwt group by scompany ) n on c.scode = n.scompany where c.scode in (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY where SCODE in ( select scomcode from SYS_USERCOMPANY where SUSER = 'xuzhao' ) and spcode = '0' and cisdel = 'N')
